refnamediv.refpurpose: Interactively monitor status of RTS2 components.

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Rts2-mon is ncurses based program, which display status of RTS2 components. It also display various system logs.

refsect1.title: KEYS

refsect2.title: State switching keys
refsect2.para: RTS2 state can be switched by F2, F3 and F4 keys. After you press that key, message dialog with question to confirm state change appear. You can use arrow keys to change answer, and confirm the message box by pressing enter. If you choose Yes as answer to question, RTS2 state will be changed.
For detailed discussions of various states, please see rts2 (7).
